properties.name: custom.system.length
properties.description: The space's side length (i.e the 'L' value).

properties.name: custom.system.particles
properties.description: The amount of particles in the space.

properties.name: custom.system.interaction-radius
properties.description: The interaction radius between the particles.

properties.name: custom.simulation.iterations
properties.description: The amount of iterations the simulation will perform.

properties.name: custom.simulation.eta
properties.description: The 'eta' value for the simulation (i.e used for calculating noise when updating speed angles).

properties.name: custom.simulation.M
properties.description: The 'M' value, used by cell index method.

properties.name: custom.output.raw
properties.description: The path for the raw file.

properties.name: custom.output.ovito
properties.description: The path for the Ovito file.
